A Guy With A Website

A Guy With A Website is a custom Wordpress build for a client that had an existing Wordpress blog. The build required custom php along with a custom Wordpress theme designed and developed from scratch to meet the client's brand expectations. Utilizing industry leading design tactics and responsive design, the blog was brought 'back to life'.

PHP, Wordpress, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, Visual Design
